-- report has to be printed in GNRL_LANGUAGE
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)

balance due), thru '7' (only debtors with balance due > 120

Text.val: -- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Switch system language to GB, in which report has to be produced
-- Switch system language back to user language

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({1,3}='1','',' and (DEBC_MARKCODESPECIALACC=9 or exists (select * from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/invo where debc_no=invo_debc_no and invo_aactuali<>0 and (INVO_MARKCODESPEC=9 or INVO_PREVIOUSMARKCODESPEC=9)))')

Header.Description: fill tmp table with invo info

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select debc_no, DEBC_REINSURANCELIM
from :1/debc join :1/debb on debc_no=debb_debc_no and DEBB_ACTINVAH<>0
where debc_admno=:2 and debc_clntno=:3 :4
order by debc_no for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: for every debtor prepare a list of actual invoices(client cur) - credit invoices
if v.bal_afrer deduction(BID704) is negative : there are no rows in table TDIV
(there is no need to call task - "Collect debtor info + delete")

SQL_STMT_U.val: delete from :1/tdiv where TDIV_CALLPROG='BXA470' and TDIV_DEBC_NO = :2 with NC

SELECT L1.TDIV_INVO_AACTUALI, L2.TDIV_INVO_AACTUALI, L3.TDIV_INVO_AACTUALI, L4.TDIV_INVO_AACTUALI, L5.TDIV_INVO_AACTUALI, L6.TDIV_INVO_AACTUALI, L7.TDIV_INVO_AACTUALI, DEBC_REINSURANCELIM, cast(CASE WHEN DEBC_MARKCODESPECIALACC=9 THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END as char(1)), DEBC_DEBC, CASE WHEN DEBC_NAME='' THEN DEBH_HADR_NAME1 ELSE DEBC_NAME END, DEBC_REINSURANCELIM, DEBC_REINSURANCELIMCURR, DEBC_NO FROM :1/TDIV AS L1 join :1/DEBC on DEBC_NO=L1.TDIV_DEBC_NO join :1/DEBH on DEBH_NO=DEBC_DEBH join :1/DEBB on DEBB_DEBC_NO=L1.TDIV_DEBC_NO and DEBB_ACTINVAH<>0 join
:1/TDIV as L2 on L2.TDIV_CALLPROG='BXA470' and L2.TDIV_DEBC_NO=L1.TDIV_DEBC_NO and L2.TDIV_INVO_NO=2 join :1/TDIV as L3 on L3.TDIV_CALLPROG='BXA470' and L3.TDIV_DEBC_NO=L1.TDIV_DEBC_NO and L3.TDIV_INVO_NO=3 join :1/TDIV as L4 on L4.TDIV_CALLPROG='BXA470' and L4.TDIV_DEBC_NO=L1.TDIV_DEBC_NO and L4.TDIV_INVO_NO=4 join :1/TDIV as L5 on L5.TDIV_CALLPROG='BXA470' and L5.TDIV_DEBC_NO=L1.TDIV_DEBC_NO and L5.TDIV_INVO_NO=5 join :1/TDIV as L6 on L6.TDIV_CALLPROG='BXA470' and L6.TDIV_DEBC_NO=L1.TDIV_DEBC_NO and L6.TDIV_INVO_NO=6 join :1/TDIV as L7 on L7.TDIV_CALLPROG='BXA470' and L7.TDIV_DEBC_NO=L1.TDIV_DEBC_NO and L7.TDIV_INVO_NO=7
WHERE L1.TDIV_CALLPROG='BXA470' and L1.TDIV_INVO_NO=1 and DEBC_ADMNO= :4 and DEBC_CLNTNO= :5 :6 :2
order by :3 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select count(*)
from :1/invo
where invo_debc_no=:2 and invo_aactuali<>0 and (INVO_MARKCODESPEC=9 or INVO_PREVIOUSMARKCODESPEC=9)

select count(*)
from :1/invo
where invo_debc_no=:2 and invo_aactualh<>0 and invo_holdcode = 'Y'
